costs.description: On Demand 5 per deployment, 50 per core, 10 per GB ram and 1 per GB disk
costs.name: On Demand 5 + Charges

manifest.manifest_content:
version: '2.1'

services:
  spark-master:
    image: elastest/ebs-spark:latest    
    volumes:
      - ./spark/alluxio_conf:/opt/alluxio/conf
      - ./spark/spark_conf:/opt/spark/conf
      - ./spark/hadoop_conf:/usr/local/hadoop/etc/hadoop
    command: ["/usr/bin/supervisord", "--configuration=/opt/conf/master.conf"]
    hostname: spark-master
    networks:
      - elastest_elastest

  spark-worker:
    image: elastest/ebs-spark:latest
    depends_on:
      - spark-master    
    volumes:
      - ./spark/alluxio_conf:/opt/alluxio/conf
      - ./spark/spark_conf:/opt/spark/conf
      - ./spark/hadoop_conf:/usr/local/hadoop/etc/hadoop
    command: ["/usr/bin/supervisord", "--configuration=/opt/conf/slave.conf"]
    networks:
      - elastest_elastest
  
networks:
  elastest_elastest:
    external: true
